name: Get Out Of Here (GOOH)
description:
Get Out Of Here (GOOH) is a 2D survival game made for Halloween. You play a treasure hunter entering an abandoned manor that may... be haunted.

HOW TO PLAY

Base configuration is : W A S D (also works as Z Q S D for AZERTY keyboards). With Shift to run, E for interaction and F for turning ON/OFF your flashlight. Be careful ! The flashlight drains its energy really fast, and you need batteries to fill it up. Your flashlight can also be used to burn down ghosts... if you found some. For that, you have a motion detector that will go orange and red the more ghosts are close. If they touch you, it will be your last breath.

Get coins throughout the game to gain more score!

There are 3 levels, each one being a new room in the manor. End the 3 to gain the final prize and complete the game.

INFORMATIONS

This game offers the possiblity to remap your keys, so you can have more ease playing it. However, all the menus are using the directional arrows and Enter to navigate.

TEAM

「MEDIA」Theo Deschamps

「DESIGN」 Regis CAUSAQUE, Elise ECHASSERIAU

「DEV」Samuel LABAGNERE, Maxime LASSERRE, Guillaume MENGELATTE
